text: man-yag geudaedeul-i geuleohge haji anhneundamyeon hananimgwa geubun-ui sadolobuteoui jeonjaeng-i iss-eul geos-eum-eul hwagsilhi alla. geuleona man-yag geudaedeul-i nwiuchindamyeon wongeum-i geudaedeul-ui geos-ini geudaedeul-eun budanghi daeuhaji anh-eumyeo geudaedeul-i budanghi daeubadjido anh-eul geos-ila
